alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Crane; Ector; Martin; Midland (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 5:35PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Ector, southeastern Andrews, Midland, southwestern Martin, northeastern Crane and northwestern Upton Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 534 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary 16 miles south of Midland International Air and Space Port, or 17 miles southeast of Odessa, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midland, Odessa, Greenwood, Midland International Air and Space Port, West Odessa, Cotton Flat, Warfield, Midland Airpark, Skywest Airport, Courtney, Odessa Schlemeyer Field, Stanton Municipal Aiport and Pleasant Farms. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 113 and 155. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
